item.description:
***I extended the RSVP TIME until 11PM tonight for anyone who would like to join us BUT there is one more seat left! You can also email me if you would like to be RSVP'd***

This Sunday, the Boston City Girls group will be having a Brunch at Johnny D's in Davis Sq (Somerville). Today I checked on weather.com and on Sunday it should be in the high-70's with a 20% chance of precipitation!

Here is their actual Menu:


**They do have a specials each week which are usually very tempting. Portions are GENEROUS!**

The cap is 10 women due to the seating (five at each table which excludes us from gratuity but service is usually really good!)

I have posted two simple questions as part of the RSVP. (Yes, this is my first time hosting a meetup.) I hope that at least ten are available on this day - if not we can reschedule for either the 15th or 29th. I will be arriving around 10:30am. At Johnny D's we can discuss any other places that we can go to next time but most importantly let's enjoy some live Jazz music, socialize and eat!
item.how_to_find_us: Near the small tables on right-hand side as you walk in. Call/Txt me at 857 574 0720.
item.name: 1 SEAT LEFT!!! -- Sunday Brunch @ Johnny D's!
